attributes.action: NOT ALLOW MARGARET THATCHER A STATE FUNERAL UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES ALLOW MARGARET THATCHER A STATE FUNERAL!THIS COUNTRY HAS NEVER RECOVERED FROM THE DAMAGE SHE DID TO IT.IF GORDON BROWN ALLOWS THIS TRAVESTY IT WILL SURELY BE THE FINAL NAIL IN HIS OWN COFFIN.DO THE BRITISH PUBLIC HAVE SHORT MEMORIES.THANK YOU.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
